rows.label: qev230501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hello and welcome back to the the Shimmer & Savvy
Financial Group. I take it you're here to avail yourself
of our exchange services, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230501_MSG0002
rows.name:
At the platinum-member exchange rate, I can give you
100,000 credits in return for 10,000 units of miranium.
That...can't be right? ...No, it's right. My goodness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230501_MSG0003
rows.name: So, um, let's perform the transaction, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230501_SEL0021
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev230501_MSG0004
rows.name:
And and here are 100,000 credits for you.
Come see us again soon, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh! Well then, next time, perhaps?
We're always looking for miranium, you know...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230501_MSG0006
rows.name:
You don't seem to, er, have enough miranium?
We need a a full 10,000 units, okay?[ST:wait ]
